name: Bremen Overseas Research and Development Association
goal:
BORDA wants to make sanitation accessible for everyone - forever.
We are passionate about environmental balance, social justice and human rights.
BORDA connects technical expertise, global insights and access to decision makers, to make a meaningful contribution in the form of knowledge, technology and empowerment.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health
euInitiatives: European Consensus on Development, Sustainable Development Goals documents and water related documents
